# GRAPHICS::STOP_PARTICLE_FX_LOOPED

## Summary
Stop a previously started looped particle effect

## Parameters
* **PTFX_ID** ptfxId: The id of the started particle effect to stop
* **BOOL** localOnly = false

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
The stopped effect will automatically clean itself up once stopped.

p1 is always 0 in the native scripts
